dublin_core.dcvalue: Injured pediatric patients in remote communities are often cared for at trauma centers that may be underserved with respect to pediatric specialty services The objective of this study is to describe a pilot telemedicine project that allows a remote trauma center s adult intensive care unit to obtain nontrauma nonsurgical related pediatric critical care consultations for acutely injured children
Pediatric critical care medicine : a journal of the Society of Critical Care Medicine and the World Federation of Pediatric Intensive and Critical Care Societies
The use of telemedicine to provide pediatric critical care consultations to pediatric trauma patients admitted to a remote trauma intensive care unit: a preliminary report.
